type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be Dataset.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#LinguisticSystem'. This property refers to a language of the Attribute Property.

description.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#description'. This property contains a free-text account of the Dataset. It corresponds with the 'description' mandatory property of DCAT-AP 2.0.1. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.

title.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#title'. This property contains a name given to the Dataset. It corresponds with the 'Title' mandatory property of DCAT-AP 2.0.1. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.

contactPoint.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#contactPoint'. It corresponds with the 'contact point' mandatory property of STAT-DCAT-AP 1.0.1. This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset. Use of vCard is recommended.

distribution.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#distribution'. This property links the Dataset to an available Distributions. It corresponds with the 'dataset distribution' mandatory property of STAT-DCAT-AP 1.0.1.

keyword.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#keyword'. This property contains a keyword or tag, describing the Dataset.

publisher.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#publisher'. This property refers to an entity (organisation) responsible for making the Dataset available.

theme.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#theme'. This property refers to a category of the Dataset. A Dataset may be associated with multiple themes.

accessRights.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#accessRights'. This property refers to information that indicates whether the Dataset is open data, has access restrictions or is not public. A controlled vocabulary with three members (:public, :restricted, :non-public) will be created and maintained by the Publications Office of the EU. Enum:'public, restricted, non-public'.

conformsTo.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#conformsTo'. This property refers to an implementing rule or other specification.

page.description: Property. Model:'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/#term_page'. This property refers to a page or document about this Dataset.

accrualPeriodicity.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#accrualPeriodicity'. This property refers to the frequency at which the Dataset is updated.

hasVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#hasVersion'. This property refers to a related Dataset that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described Dataset.

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#identifier'. This property contains the main identifier for the Dataset, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalogue.

isVersionOf.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#isVersionOf'. This property contains the main identifier for the Dataset, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalogue.

landingPage.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#landingPage'. This property refers to a web page that provides access to the Dataset, its Distributions and/or additional information. It is intended to point to a landing page at the original data provider, not to a page on a site of a third party, such as an aggregator.

alternateIdentifier.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#Identifier'. This property refers to a secondary identifier of the Dataset, such as MAST/ADS, DataCite, DOI, EZID or W3ID.

provenance.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#provenance'. This property contains a statement about the lineage of a Dataset.

relation.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#relation'. This property refers to a related resource.

issued.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#issued'. This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Dataset.

sample.description: Property. Model:'https://www.w3.org/ns/adms#sample'. This property refers to a sample distribution of the dataset.

source.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#source'. T his property refers to a related Dataset from which the described Dataset is derived.

spatial.description: Geoproperty. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#spatial'. This property refers to a geographic region that is covered by the Dataset.

temporal.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#temporal'. This property refers to a temporal period that the Dataset covers. Model:'dct:PeriodOfTime'.

modified.description: Property. Model:'https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/#modified'. This property contains the most recent date on which the Dataset was changed or modified.

versionInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#versionInfo'. This property contains a version number or other version designation of the Dataset.

versionNotes.description: Property. Model:'http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#versionNotes'. This property contains a description of the differences between this version and a previous version of the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the version notes.

attribute.description: Property. Model:'http://data.europa.eu/s1n#attribute'. This property links to a component used to qualify and interpret observed values, e.g. units of measure, any scaling factors and metadata such as the status of the observation (e.g. estimated, provisional). Attribute is a conceptual entity that applies to all distribution formats, e.g. in case a dataset is provided both in SDMX and in Data Cube.

dimension.description: Property. Model:'http://data.europa.eu/s1n#dimension'. This property links to a component that identifies observations, e.g. the time to which the observation applies, or a geographic region which the observation covers. Dimension is a conceptual entity that applies to all distribution formats, e.g. in case a dataset is provided both in SDMX and in Data Cube.

statUnitMeasure.description: Property. Model:'http://data.europa.eu/s1n#UnitMeasure'. This property links to a unit of measurement of the observations, for example Euro, square kilometre, purchasing power standard (PPS), full- time equivalent, percentage. Unit of measurement is a conceptual entity that applies to all distribution formats , e.g. in the case when a dataset is provided both in SDMX and in Data Cube.
